sqlMap.statement:
SELECT INLINE1.VND_INV_NUM ,INLINE1.ORIG_VND_INV_NUM ,INLINE1.INV_DT ,INLINE1.INV_TP_CD ,INLINE1.VND_CD ,INLINE1.INV_TOT_DEAL_NET_AMT ,INLINE1.INV_TOT_DEAL_SLS_AMT ,INLINE1.INV_TOT_DEAL_FRT_AMT ,INLINE1.INV_TOT_DEAL_TAX_AMT ,INLINE1.INV_TOT_DEAL_DISC_AMT ,INLINE1.INV_TOT_DEAL_INS_AMT ,INLINE1.CUST_ISS_PO_NUM ,INLINE1.PAYER_CUST_CD ,INLINE1.INV_TOT_PKG_QTY ,INLINE1.INV_TOT_GRS_WT FROM VND_INV_WRK INLINE1 WHERE INLINE1.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND INLINE1.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd#
AND (INLINE1.INV_AR_PROC_STS_CD IS NULL OR INLINE1.INV_AR_PROC_STS_CD NOT IN
#invArProcStsCd[]#
)
AND INLINE1.CR_DR_RSN_CD = #rsnCd_10#

SELECT INLINE1.INV_NUM ,INLINE1.ORIG_INV_NUM ,INLINE1.GRP_INV_NUM ,INLINE1.INV_TP_CD ,INLINE1.INV_DT ,INLINE1.ACCT_DT ,INLINE1.CR_INV_TP_CD ,INLINE1.CPO_ORD_NUM ,INLINE1.ORIG_CPO_ORD_NUM ,INLINE1.ORD_DT ,INLINE1.CUST_ISS_PO_NUM ,INLINE1.BILL_TO_CUST_CD ,INLINE1.INV_TOT_DEAL_NET_AMT ,INLINE1.INV_TOT_DEAL_SLS_AMT ,INLINE1.INV_TOT_DEAL_FRT_AMT ,INLINE1.INV_TOT_DEAL_TAX_AMT ,INLINE1.INV_TOT_DEAL_DISC_AMT FROM INV INLINE1 WHERE INLINE1.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND INLINE1.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND INLINE1.INV_NUM = #invNum# AND INLINE1.INV_TP_CD = #invTpCd_1#
